name: Color Land - Build by Number
description:
Color and build your very own magnificent land, one tap at a time. In this relaxing 3D color by number game, players create amazing scenery and build a breathtaking city!

Use your green thumb to decorate your city. Relax as your 3D coloring book comes to life with evergreens, paddling ponds, lily pads, ducks, people, and fields of green.

How does your land flourish?
- Create amazing scenery as you color by number!
- Each level starts with a blank 3D coloring canvas waiting to blossom!
- To build your land, simply color by number
- Tap the cube according to the number and matching elements are shown at the bottom of the screen.
- With just one click, a new color or element appears
- Tap to add even more color to your masterpiece
- Add a touch of green… or maybe a small garden pond in blue
- Build it all with just the touch of your finger!
- Watch as the scenery flourishes with flowers, trees, and cute little duckies!
- As you color by number, new layers appear revealing even more color and rewards

This relaxing and calming game lets players color and build their own gorgeous land

As you build each structure and complete levels, more coloring pages open up, uncovering a city map. Color by layers to build up the entire land with amazing scenery!

- Enjoy a fresh, new landscape with each level
- Decorate your city with lakes, trees, ponds, and park benches to sit and take in garden views.

You’ll truly have a green thumb! Have fun with this easy, distressing way to pass the day. Grow a gorgeous garden with the touch of your hand. Color Land: Color by Number puts it all right at your fingertips. Color, build, and relax!
